response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, offering unparalleled benefits that align with your needs and aspirations. Considering its immense value, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $14,000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only secure a remarkable piece but also benefit from our commitment to customer satisfaction, including personalized support and a hassle-free purchasing experience. We look forward to the possibility of enhancing your collection or operations with this extraordinary product.", "product_price": 14000}
